tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, set upright; hence (figuratively as adjective) just; but usually (as adverb or conjunction) rightly or so (in various applications to manner, time and relation; often with other particles)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
